Add your client, items, tax, and more.
You can also add payment instructions and request a deposit.
Preview it, write a message, and send it by email, SMS, or another way.
Online payments are auto-reconciled. Other payments can be manually marked as paid.

Let your customers pay easily and securely with PayPal. Turning PayPal on also lets your customers pay with Venmo, if they have it installed. Eligible customers can pay using PayPal Credit too.

Fees apply for PayPal and Venmo payments.

How it works:
1. Turn PayPal on
2. Customers see the option to pay with PayPal (or Venmo, if they have it)
3. Payment goes directly into your PayPal account

Let your customers pay easily and securely with PayPal.

Transaction fees apply.

How it works:
1. Turn PayPal on
2. Customers see the option to pay with PayPal
3. Payment goes directly into your PayPal account
Enabling PayPal also lets your customers pay with Venmo if they have it installed.\nEligible customers can pay using PayPal Credit too.
Don\'t have a PayPal account? PayPal will create one for you with the email you use for Invoice2go.
Don\'t have an account? PayPal will create one for you with the email you use for Invoice2go.
Fees apply for PayPal and Venmo payments.

Invoice2go Card Payments will replace Stripe, allowing you to accept credit and debit card payments. \nSwitch before %1$s and get 30 days of free Instant Payouts (a %2$s fee applies after the 30-day period).
To keep accepting credit and debit cards, set up %1$as\n Switch now and get: %2$as
Instant Payouts for free for 30 days
Up to %1$s in card processing fees covered for 90 days.

Set up Invoice2go Card payments by %1$as, and Invoice2go will waive fees for Instant Payouts for 30 days. 
 
To be eligible for this offer you must: %2$asInvoice2go will waive Instant Payout fees until Thirty(30) days from the date you switch and get fully approved for Invoice2go Card Payments
 
After the 30-day period, a %3$as fee will apply for instant payouts. 
 
The fee waiver does NOT include fees related to refunds or disputes/chargebacks that are processed on any Invoice2go Instant Payouts. 
 
Invoice2go reserves the right to modify this offer at any time.

\n*Eligible Bank Accounts include accounts at financial institutions which participate in the Real Time Payments (RTP) Network which can receive RTP. To find out if your account is enabled to receive RTP, please contact your financial institution. You can check if your bank is part of the RTP Network by accessing\u0020

Link your Eligible Bank Account* to start using Invoice2go Instant Payouts.

will apply.
 
If any refunds, disputes/chargebacks are processed on any Invoice2go Card Payments, the fees for those refunds, disputes/chargebacks will also count toward your %1$s Card Payment fee waiver limit.
